product_name: Deuter ACT Trail 38 EL Pack - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Made to handle everything from a classic day hike to travel, the ACT Trail 38 EL pack is the extended-length version of the popular ACT Trail, making it a great option for hikers with longer torsos.
short_description: Made to handle everything from a classic day hike to travel, the ACT Trail 38 EL pack is the extended-length version of the popular ACT Trail, making it a great option for hikers with longer torsos.
